responses.rationale: The segment describes an issue as a 'short-term blip' that 'will resolve itself very quickly', which is not a bare negation.
The segment states outbreaks were 'quickly reined in and stamped out', which describes control/elimination, not a bare negation.
The segment describes an issue as a 'short-term blip' and explains why it will resolve, neither of which is a bare negation.
The segment states 'we will be able to eliminate this', which is a statement of future capability, not a bare negation.
The segment describes symptoms and duration, which is not a bare negation.
The segment states an expectation of price increase, which is not a bare negation.
The segment states financial damages, which is not a bare negation.
The segment expresses a personal sentiment ('encouraged'), which is not a bare negation.
